name: Allan McConnell
text: I performed a wedding here - great venue! Allan McConnell, ANOTHER HAPPY COUPLE WEDDING SERVICES

name: Carlissa Strong Cunningham
text: I love Christmas light shows! This is one of the best. It's fun, entertaining, and athestically  engaging. Tune into 100.9 and you won't even realize you've been sitting, singing, and watching the lights for about 20 minutes. Well worth a visit.

name: Kevin Cunningham
text: High-tech light show set to a variety of music. It is not a drive-thru show, but it is free and the displays are magnificent. Well done and professional looking.

name: Pat Kelley
text: Great display.  Close to my house and I’ve been several times!!  Thank you Mello family

resp.text: I am sorry to hear it. But could you share a little bit more information what you think is bad?
